title: Mune ga Naru no wa Kimi no Sei
original_name: 胸が鳴るのは君のせい
sinopse:
We were sharing the same feelings but he didn't realize it at all. Even though, I love him. That's what I have always thought for the past two years...

(Source: Chibi Manga)

Included one-shots:
Volume 2: Bye Bye Regret
Volume 4: Koisuru Usotsuki
